Description: For sale is a 1984 Gibson Les Paul Studio Standard with a non original case. This guitar is in good condition and in perfect working order. There are some scratches, dings, finish checking, wear on the back, and (4) extra screw holes around the truss rod cover. Overall, I would give it a solid 7.5 out of 10 condition. With exception to the pickups, bridge and frets everything on the guitar is original. There are no cracks, repairs, or issues. The neck is straight with no issues. The non original frets are in excellent condition with no wear. The non original case works great. SPECS: Nut Width: 1.70" 1st Fret: 0.80" 12th Fret: 0.94" Neck Type: Thin Finger Board: Rosewood Pickups: Seymour Duncan Antiquity Weight: 8lb 8oz If you scroll all the way down to the bottom of the pictures you can see detailed pictures of the frets, any wear on the guitar, and the guitar taken apart. I have provided tons of pictures. Please check them out. Utah residents please add 7.05% sales tax. Please call, text, or message me if you have any questions 18013179013.
